title: Potato â€” Late blight
description: Rapidly spreading blight causing dark lesions and tuber rot (Phytophthora infestans); use certified seed, good drainage, and timely fungicides.

treatment.chemical: Apply mancozeb or chlorothalonil when weather is favorable for disease and repeat every 7-10 days.
treatment.organic: Use certified seed potatoes, improve drainage, remove infected plants, and use copper-based sprays.
